detail_desc: Knee-length lace dress with a round neckline and short puff sleeves. Concealed zip at the back and a seam under the bust with pleats for added width. Jersey lining.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long, pleated skirt in a softly draping crêpe weave with a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening in one side. Lined.
Long, pleated skirt in a softly draping crêpe weave with a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening in one side. Lined.
Long, pleated skirt in a softly draping crêpe weave with a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening in one side. Lined.
Long, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim. Lined.
Long, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim. Lined.

Padded, quilted coat in woven fabric with a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, flap patch pockets, a drawstring at the waist and soft inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Padded, quilted coat in woven fabric with a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, flap patch pockets, a drawstring at the waist and soft inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Platform sandals in imitation leather with covered heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles.

Ankle-length skirt woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Gathered and fitted at the top with a seam at the hips, and flared to the hem with high slits at the front. Partly lined.
Reversible sun hat in soft, cotton jersey with one patterned side and one solid-colour side. Narrow ties underneath. Width of brim 7 cm.

Backpack in water-repellent nylon with a handle at the top, adjustable shoulder straps and a roll-top opening with a tab and carabiner hook. One zipped outer compartment. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Depth 12 cm. Width 30 cm. Total height 63 cm.
Cotton trousers, one pair in twill and one pair in denim, with an elasticated, drawstring waist, a fake fly and fake pockets. The cotton content of the trousers is partly recycled and partly organic.
Short, sleeveless, straight-cut dress in softly draping satin with a small pleated stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck, and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Short, sleeveless, straight-cut dress in softly draping satin with a small pleated stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck, and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Short, sleeveless, straight-cut dress in softly draping satin with a small pleated stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck, and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Short, sleeveless, straight-cut dress in softly draping satin with a small pleated stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck, and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Short, sleeveless, straight-cut dress in softly draping satin with a small pleated stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck, and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Treggings in soft cotton corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, easy pull-on elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in soft twill. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Long dress in an airy, slightly crinkled weave. Small stand-up collar with narrow smocking and a small frill trim, narrow, detachable ties at the waist and an airy, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back, and a slit at the front of the hem. Lined.
Short, sleeveless dress in ribbed organic cotton jersey. Square neckline with a broderie anglaise frill trim. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless dress in ribbed organic cotton jersey. Square neckline with a broderie anglaise frill trim. Unlined.

Backpack in soft imitation leather with a zip at the top, padded, adjustable shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment with a small appliqué on the front. Lined. Depth 12 cm. Width 29 cm. Height 35.5 cm.

Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with an inset lace trim down the front. Narrow cut with gathers at the top, short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with a flounce at the hem.

Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with an inset lace trim down the front. Narrow cut with gathers at the top, short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with a flounce at the hem.

Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with an inset lace trim down the front. Narrow cut with gathers at the top, short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with a flounce at the hem.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and pair of dungaree shorts in soft cotton denim. Patterned T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y). Dungaree shorts with a button at the sides and adjustable, elasticated straps with a button. Open chest pocket with a small fabric appliqué and concealed press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y).

Sleeveless sports top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline and racer back. Integral sports bra with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and an elasticated hem. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Sleeveless sports top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline and racer back. Integral sports bra with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and an elasticated hem. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Straight-cut top in a viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Straight-cut top in a viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Straight-cut top in a viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Short-sleeved, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, short sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, short sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, short sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, short sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in soft, ribbed viscose jersey.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in soft, ribbed viscose jersey.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in soft, ribbed viscose jersey.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in soft, ribbed viscose jersey.

Shorts in woven fabric with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups.

Shorts in woven fabric with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups.

Shorts in woven fabric with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups.

Fancy dress costume in glittery jersey with a shimmering metallic print. Narrow shoulder straps with organza flounces, a glittery appliqué at the top, a flounced, V-shaped seam at the waist and a flared skirt in shimmering organza. Detachable, padded tail in patterned satin with a hook and loop fastening. The skirt is lined with taffeta.

Calf-length jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a yoke and short sleeves in lace. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt, and side pockets.
Hoodie in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and double-layered hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Set with a top and skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a tie detail at the hem. Bell-shaped skirt with a visible elastic waistband. Unlined.
Set with a top and skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a tie detail at the hem. Bell-shaped skirt with a visible elastic waistband. Unlined.
Batik-patterned cap in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a print motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Windbreaker in nylon with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Kangaroo pocket and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Set with a T-shirt and shorts in soft, printed fabric. Jersey T-shirt with raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves and a chest pocket with a button. Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a T-shirt and shorts in soft, printed fabric. Jersey T-shirt with raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves and a chest pocket with a button. Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Batik-patterned cap in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a print motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Cropped bomber jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud, and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Taffeta lining made from recycled polyester.
Smartphone case in plastic covered in imitation leather with a metal chain and imitation leather lanyard.
Soft smartphone case in transparent plastic with a detachable strap. Can be worn around the neck or over one shoulder. Length of strap approx. 120 cm.

Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, opening at the front and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top and a decorative pompom trim around the yoke and down the front. Gently dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves with scalloped edges. Unlined.

Set with a T-shirt and matching shorts. T-shirt in patterned slub cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline and sleeves, a chest pocket with a button, and a rounded hem. Shorts in lightweight slub sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Set with a hat, tube scarf and gloves in a soft, fine knit. Hat with a ribbed turn-up at the hem and pompom on top. Scarf with a twisted detail. Gloves with double-layered ribbing at the cuffs.
Batik-patterned swim shorts in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Waist bag in woven fabric with an embroidered text motif. One large compartment with a concealed zip at the front and one zipped compartment at the back. Adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Depth approx. 5 cm. Height approx. 16 cm. Width approx. 28 cm.
V-neck top in softly draping satin with a lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neckline, button placket and short slits in the sides. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neckline, button placket and short slits in the sides. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Batik-patterned swim shorts in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details in a looser fit with a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly organic.
